metadata.title: CVE-2022-1146 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in Resource Timing in Google Chrome prior to100.0.4896.60 allowed a remote attacker to leak cross-origin data via acrafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
